definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, historically derived from the Old English elements 'gōd' (good) and 'wine' (friend), meaning 'good friend'. It is used as a family name and does not carry a general lexical meaning outside of personal identification.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自古英语的姓氏，由 'gōd'（好的）和 'wine'（朋友）组成，意为‘好朋友’。该词仅作为人名使用，不具有除个人身份识别外的普通词汇含义。
definitions.example_en: Dr. Goodwin presented her research on climate change at the international conference.
definitions.example_cn: 古德温博士在国际会议上展示了她关于气候变化的研究。
